title: AUSTRALIAN SERVERS? ANYONE HAVING LATENCY ISSUES ONLY ON LOL SERVERS?
body:
Hi All,
I have noticed an alarming rate of Australian players suffering from latency issues.
Some constant and some intermittent.
If you have spoken to your service provider and have no other latency issues with anything other than League of Legends please comment for the benefit of us players and hopefully get to the bottom of this issue.

Kind Regards 
Smashemm

replies.body: i do get them at random times ever since the last update. it will steady for ages then randomly get massive spikes. never had a problem ever before this

Yeah some people on Telstra had this issue for the past week. Like the rest of the internet is fine, and they are getting 20-30ms ping in game, but at random moment will just disconnect from the game and have to restart their client.
I'm not getting any latency issues, might be in certain areas?
